long_description: Head to the crags or hiking trails in the men's stretchy, rugged Kuhl Raid soft-shell pants with a 32 in. inseam. You'll love the 6 zippered pockets that keep your gear from getting lost. Nylon/spandex technical soft-shell fabric features 4-way stretch, excellent abrasion-resistance and a durable water repellent finish. Reverse-coil zippers repel snow and rain. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Classic jeans styling offers 6 zippered pockets: 2 hand, 2 rear, 2 side. Kuhl Raid 32 in. inseam pants for men are designed to be worn over a base layer or alone.
short_description: Head to the crags or hiking trails in the men's stretchy, rugged Kuhl Raid soft-shell pants with a 32 in. inseam. You'll love the 6 zippered pockets that keep your gear from getting lost.
